<br>
Aggravated assaults over the last 12 months are <h8>`r ifelse(assaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12>=0," up"," down")` `r ifelse(assaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12>=0,assaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12,substring(assaults_city$inc_prior3yearavgtolast12,2))`%</h8> compared to the annual average over the last three years, according to the Los Angeles Police Department and Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department data through `r format(asofdate, "%B %d")`.

The areas of the county policed by the LAPD and Sheriff's Department averaged <h8>`r prettyNum(round(assaults_city$last12mos/52,0), big.mark=",")`</h8> aggravated assaults a week over the last 12 months. In 2019, that number was <h8>`r prettyNum(round(assaults_city$total19/52,0), big.mark=",")`</h8> a week.

The totals include only aggravated assaults, which police generally define as someone being attacked or seriously injured by another person, whether or not they used a firearm or other weapon.

<subhead>A closer look at Los Angeles assaults neighborhood by neighborhood</subhead>

The danger is not the same neighborhood to neighborhood. ABC7's data team looked at data from the Los Angeles Police Department and Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department by neighborhood from 2019 through `r format(asofdate, "%B %d, %Y")`, the latest date for which records are available from the two agencies.

The map color codes each police district by the aggravated assault rate over the last 12 months. The three darker blues represent neighborhoods with assault rates that are higher than the citywide rate. You can also click the box in the bottom right corner to see neighborhoods by the number of aggravated assaults.

Click on any area on the map to see detailed numbers, rates and trends. 

You can find your neighborhood by using the box at the top of the map to search for any street, place, landmark or zip code to zoom to that location.

<br>

```{r cars, echo=FALSE,out.width='100%',out.height='600'}
# assault MAP
# Set bins for numbers of crimes for assaults map
assaultbins1 <- c(0,
                200,
                500,
                750,
                1000,
                2000)
assaultbins2 <- c(0,
                250,
                500,
                750,
                1000,
                2500)
assaultpal1 <- colorBin(c("#aecfe6",
                             "#2787d6",
                             "#0058f6",
                             "#003ca6",
                             "#00215c"), assaults_district$rate_last12, bins = assaultbins1,na.color = "#51585f")

assaultpal2 <- colorBin(c("#aecfe6",
                             "#2787d6",
                             "#0058f6",
                             "#003ca6",
                             "#00215c"), assaults_district$last12mos, bins = assaultbins2,na.color = "#51585f")


# Create quick labels for assaults map
assaultlabel <- paste(sep="",
                     "<popuptitle>",
                     prettyNum(assaults_district$last12mos, big.mark=","),
                     " assaults </popuptitle><br>",
                     " in the last 12 months in Police District <b>",
                     assaults_district$district,
                     "</b>, which includes the <b>",
                     assaults_district$placename,
                     "</b>areas, home to an estimated ",
                     prettyNum(assaults_district$population, big.mark=","),
                     " people.
<br>

# Creating police beats map for types of crimes
losangeles_assault_map <- leaflet(assaults_district, options = leafletOptions(zoomControl = FALSE, zoomSnap = 0.5, zoomDelta=0.5)) %>%
  htmlwidgets::onRender("function(el, x) {
L.control.zoom({ position: 'topright' }).addTo(this)
}") %>%
  setView(-118.24, 34.05, zoom = 10) %>% 
  addProviderTiles(provider = "CartoDB.Positron") %>%
  addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = assaultlabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~assaultpal1(rate_last12),
              group="Rate") %>% 
    addPolygons(color = "white", 
              popup = assaultlabel,
              popupOptions = popupOptions(maxWidth ="200", 
                                          minWidth ="200"),
              weight = 2, 
              smoothFactor = 0.5,
              opacity = 0.6, 
              fillOpacity = 0.6,
              fillColor = ~assaultpal2(last12mos),
              group="Number") %>% 
  addSearchOSM(options = searchOptions(autoCollapse=FALSE, minLength = 3,zoom=13, position="topleft")) %>%
    onRender("function(el, x) {
        $('input.search-input')[0].placeholder = 'Search street, place or zip code'
        }") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = assaults_district$rate_last12, 
            pal = assaultpal1,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Assault Rate<br><popupchatter>Aggravated assaults/100K people<br>Citywide: ",prettyNum(round(assaults_city$rate_last12,0), big.mark=",")),
            group = "Rate",
            className = "info legend Rate") %>%
  addLegend(opacity = 0.6,
            values = assaults_district$last12mos, 
            pal = assaultpal2,
            position = "bottomleft", 
            title = paste(sep="","<popuptitle>Assaults<br><popupchatter>Total assaults<br>Citywide: ",prettyNum(round(assaults_city$last12mos,0), big.mark=",")),
            group = "Number",
            className = "info legend Number") %>%
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c("Rate","Number"),
    options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE),
    position = 'bottomright') %>% hideGroup(c("Number")) %>%
   htmlwidgets::onRender("
      function(el, x) {
         var updateLegend = function () {
            var selectedGroup = document.querySelectorAll('input:checked')[0].nextSibling.innerText.substr(1);

            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(a => a.hidden=true);
            document.querySelectorAll('.legend').forEach(l => {
               if (l.classList.contains(selectedGroup)) l.hidden=false;
            });
         };
         updateLegend();
         this.on('baselayerchange', el => updateLegend());
      }"
   )
losangeles_assault_map
```
